languages.text: "Вместо мертвого лязга чудовищных механизмов, рева двигателей и сбивчивых голосов твоих подчиненных я слушаю и внимаю безмолвию. Оно возникает в моменты душевного спокойствия, и в этой тишине мы становимся свидетелями преобразований своего внутреннего мира".

"Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."
languages.original_text: "Вместо мертвого лязга чудовищных механизмов, рева двигателей и сбивчивых голосов твоих подчиненных я слушаю и внимаю безмолвию. Оно возникает в моменты душевного спокойствия, и в этой тишине мы становимся свидетелями преобразований своего внутреннего мира".

traits.locale_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

"Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

"Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

"Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

languages.text: «En vez del clamor inánime de mecanismos monstruosos, el rugido de los motores y las voces discordantes de tus acólitos, yo oigo y sirvo al silencio. Surge en momentos de serenidad espiritual, y en su quietud somos testigos de las transformaciones de nuestro propio mundo interior».
languages.original_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

traits.locale_text: «En vez del clamor inánime de mecanismos monstruosos, el rugido de los motores y las voces discordantes de tus acólitos, yo oigo y sirvo al silencio. Surge en momentos de serenidad espiritual, y en su quietud somos testigos de las transformaciones de nuestro propio mundo interior».

languages.text: 「我は怪物のような機械の生気のない喧騒やエンジンの轟音、従者たちの不協和音の代わりに、静寂に耳を傾け、心を預ける。精神的な静けさに包まれた瞬間に生まれるもので、その静けさに包まれたとき、自身の内なる世界の変貌を目撃することができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

traits.locale_text: 「我は怪物のような機械の生気のない喧騒やエンジンの轟音、従者たちの不協和音の代わりに、静寂に耳を傾け、心を預ける。精神的な静けさに包まれた瞬間に生まれるもので、その静けさに包まれたとき、自身の内なる世界の変貌を目撃することができるのだ」

languages.text: “相比庞大机器死气沉沉的噪音、发动机的轰鸣，以及你的同伴们所发出的种种不和谐的喧嚣，我总是专注于寻找并聆听寂静。寂静诞生于平和的心灵，只有在万籁俱寂中，我们才能见证自己内在世界的变化。”
languages.original_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

traits.locale_text: “相比庞大机器死气沉沉的噪音、发动机的轰鸣，以及你的同伴们所发出的种种不和谐的喧嚣，我总是专注于寻找并聆听寂静。寂静诞生于平和的心灵，只有在万籁俱寂中，我们才能见证自己内在世界的变化。”

languages.text: « Au lieu de la clameur sans vie de monstrueux mécanismes, du rugissement des moteurs et des voix discordantes de vos compagnons, j'écoute le silence et je veille sur lui. Il naît dans les périodes de sérénité spirituelle, et c'est dans cette immobilité que nous devenons les témoins des transformations de notre monde intérieur. »
languages.original_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

traits.locale_text: « Au lieu de la clameur sans vie de monstrueux mécanismes, du rugissement des moteurs et des voix discordantes de vos compagnons, j'écoute le silence et je veille sur lui. Il naît dans les périodes de sérénité spirituelle, et c'est dans cette immobilité que nous devenons les témoins des transformations de notre monde intérieur. »

languages.text: "Statt des leblosen Lärms monströser Mechanismen, des Brüllens von Maschinen und der diskordanten Stimmen Eurer Anhänger höre und pflege ich Stille. Sie erhebt sich in Augenblicken spirituellen Friedens, und in dieser Stille werden wir Zeuge der Transformationen unserer eigenen inneren Welt."
languages.original_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

traits.locale_text: "Statt des leblosen Lärms monströser Mechanismen, des Brüllens von Maschinen und der diskordanten Stimmen Eurer Anhänger höre und pflege ich Stille. Sie erhebt sich in Augenblicken spirituellen Friedens, und in dieser Stille werden wir Zeuge der Transformationen unserer eigenen inneren Welt."

languages.text: "Devasa mekanizmaların cansız gürültüsü, motorların kükreyişi ve takipçilerinin ahenksiz sesleri yerine işitip sessizliğe bürünüyorum. Ruhani huzur anlarında yükseliyor. Biz de o sakinlikte iç dünyamızın değişimine tanık oluyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Instead of the lifeless clamour of monstrous mechanisms, the roar of engines, and the discordant voices of your followers, I hear and attend to silence. It arises in moments of spiritual serenity, and in that stillness we become witnesses to the transformations of our own inner world."

traits.locale_text: "Devasa mekanizmaların cansız gürültüsü, motorların kükreyişi ve takipçilerinin ahenksiz sesleri yerine sessizliğe bürünüyorum. Ruhani huzur anlarında yükseliyor ve o sakinlikte iç dünyamızın değişimine tanık oluyoruz."
